languages.english-overview:
u-Auctions is an open-source auction script written in the popular language PHP which is a massive collection of inbuilt features u-Auctions is the prefect chose for setting up any auction site in minutes.
u-Auctions has an easy to use administration panel and a user friendly installation process, which allows you to have your own auction site set up in minutes.
u-Auctions is released under the GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE.

ul.li: Seller can use custom bid increment
Proxy bidding makes it easier for users to bid on two different items being sold at the same time
Sellers will be able to upload pictures up to the maximum you specify
Facebook Login allows the user to login with there facebook account
Share auctions allows the user to share auctions on Google+, Facebook and Twitter
Users can use the built in payment gateways to pay for items and fees (paypal/authorize.net/Worldpay/Skrill/2Checkout)
Users can make Standard, Dutch or Digital items auctions
Users can add there own Item Condition to there auctions
Users can Report Auctions to the site admin
SEO is used to make the address link look better and used to help optimize the address to be found in search engines
Users can add there own favourite seller
Users can add there own Advertisement banner from there control panel and the banner will be displayed at the top right corrner of the header
No app needed the webpages will auto resize to fit the screen
Phpass is a framework aimed at simplifying the process for encrypting or hashing the passwords
